title: Shousetsuka no Shitsukekata
sinopse:
The unbalanced relationship between a dominating, manipulative erotic novelist and his new editor, who also happens to be his most loyal fan.

(Source: MU)

1. Shousetsuka ni Koi shitara (If You Fall in Love with a Novelist)
2. Shousetsuka no Shitsukekata (How to Discipline a Novelist)
3. Shousetsuka no Aishikata (How to Love a Novelist)
4. Summer Garden Beach
5. Utsukushii Kago (Beautiful Cage)
6. Itsuka no Umi he (Someday, to the Beach)
